ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Fear **SPOILERS**
ygData.msgSnippet: So this means don t go into a plane without a druid or wizard?  that is rather limiting to us explorer types.  Bummer.  Once again the big V seems determined
ygData.messageBody:
So this means don't go into a plane without a druid or wizard? that
is rather limiting to us explorer types. Bummer. Once again the big
V seems determined to reduce EQ to a world or skinny spellcasters.


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Plane of Fear **SPOILERS**
Author: Non-HP-Michael.Garramone (Michael.Garramone@...) at
HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 7/29/99 10:34 AM


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

If you bound in the plane, you can not leave unless you have someone come in
and group gate you out. there is no zone out, the gate is one-way. you
have to gate or group gate out. have fun =)

Shada


> Have fun!
> Oh, BTW I used my 13th level gnome magician to run around in
> there because i
> wanted to bind inside in case I got killed so I would not
> have to run all
> the way back. =) SCARY! (is that a run-on?)
>
> Acinonyx (used the /surname command =P ) Lanoche
> 20th Level Bard of Bristlebane
